RentBike - Class in clui
The RentBike class provides functionality for renting a bike from a docking station or a specific location.
RentBike() - Constructor for class clui.RentBike
 
renting - package renting
 
renting(Users) - Static method in class terminals.RentingTerminalMethods
This part corresponds to the renting interaction for the user.
renting_allowed(Users) - Static method in class terminals.RentingTerminalMethods
It allows the user to rent at most one bike.
RentingTerminal - Class in terminals
The class describes a terminal that the user will interact with.
RentingTerminal() - Constructor for class terminals.RentingTerminal
 
RentingTerminalMethods - Class in terminals
This terminal (representing the app) allows to - interact with the user to rent and return a bike - prevent a user from renting more than one bike at a time - create an ongoing trip added to the list ongoing_trips - register when a bike is parked in a docking station - register when a bike is let on the streets - add the trip to the log of finished trips (balances are updated automatically thanks to observer pattern)
RentingTerminalMethods() - Constructor for class terminals.RentingTerminalMethods
 
resetuniqID() - Static method in class main.DockingStations
Resets the ID (only for JUnit tests)
ReturnBike - Class in clui
The ReturnBike class provides functionality for returning a rented bike to a docking station or a specific location.
ReturnBike() - Constructor for class clui.ReturnBike
 
returning(Users, Bicycles, int) - Static method in class terminals.RentingTerminalMethods
This part corresponds to the returning interaction for the user.
